mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stories (user_id, story_image, created_at, expires_at) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{storyImage}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP + INTERVAL '24 hours')
mapper.select: SELECT story_id, user_id, story_image, created_at, user_name, user_avatar FROM active_stories_view
SELECT DISTINCT ON (user_id) user_id, user_name, user_avatar, created_at FROM active_stories_view WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' ORDER BY user_id, created_at DESC
SELECT story_id, user_id, story_image, created_at, user_name, user_avatar FROM active_stories_view WHERE created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
